text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Nobody showed up to your rally. Nice walk of shame with your make up smeared all over your shirt collar.  Nice that you make jokes about COVID-19 when we’ve lost over 120,000 people. You’re a disgrace and an embarrassment. We’re now pitied by the world because you are our leader.
